name: @nkzw/palette-swap
author: Christoph Nakazawa <christoph.pojer@gmail.com>
description: Image palette swapping and color replacement tool based on canvas for Node.js and browsers.

scripts.build: mkdir -p lib && rm lib/*; tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --noEmit false && esbuild --target=node18 --format=esm --platform=node --outfile=lib/palette-swap.js --external:canvas --bundle ./src/palette-swap.js
